story_27_60000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Yeah, we’ll execute the plan during the second
round of the semifinals. Let the others know.
story_27_60000/2401_1001_0200_10: OK, now the word is out. Next...
story_27_60000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The only thing left to do is make Hoopa bring us
even more Pokémon. Then we’ll be ready 
for anything!
story_27_60000/2401_1001_0400_10:
What are you calling me for? Can’t you tell
I’m busy?
story_27_60000/2401_1001_0500_10: Sir, we have a problem! Lear’s attacking us!
story_27_60000/2401_1001_0700_10:
And he’s way stronger than before! Quick, we
need your backu—
story_27_60000/2401_1001_0800_10: Hey! What’s going on? Answer me!
story_27_60000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Heh heh heh. In that case, I know exactly what
to do.
